name: Spitfire Assault
overview: Basically move from side to side and up and down to avoid the cursor and shoot an enemies, for no score, and survive. Released as a part of Assassins Disk 207. The game is set in WWII. You are flying on a mission with your squadron, but your wingman and your fellow flyers were shot down. You must get back to England alone. Avoid the enemy target sites behind you and shoot planes for energy bonuses.
